47 -    def in_hdfs(self): 

48          listing = hdfs.ls(self.graph_handle)["stdout"].split("\n") 
49          found = False 
50          disk_tail = self.graph_handle.split("/")[-1] 
51          for line in listing: 
52              hdfs_tail = line.split("/")[-1] 
53              if disk_tail == hdfs_tail: 
54                  found = True 
55                  break 
56          return found
